root.name: Sticky Balls
root.description: HistoryÂ Sticky Balls was originally developed for Pocket PCs but it was cancelled. Zed Two was purchased by Warthog Plc and development started on the PSP but was also cancelled despite nearing completion. Warthog Plc was then purchased by Tiger Telematics and the game was eventually released on the ill-fated Gizmondo and is notorious for its funny name.
